item.title: With food stamps set to dry up, SNAP recipients say they fear what's next
item.description: "Now we'll have to prioritize which bills we can pay and which can wait," said one mother of two about a looming freeze in food aid.

item.title: WATCH: Lobby of luxury Florida hotel flooded amid storms
item.description: Experts said the storm unleased rains comparable to what the region saw from a hurricane in 2022.

item.title: Chicago’s children are getting caught in the chaos of immigration crackdowns
Senate tees up 13th vote on GOP funding bill on Day 28 of shutdown
item.description: The government shutdown is now on Day 28 as the Senate prepares to hold a 13th procedural vote on a bill to end the impasse. Follow live updates here.

item.title: WATCH: Japanese PM gifts Trump late Shinzo Abe's putter
item.description: Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi gifted President Trump the putter of late Japanese prime minister Shinzo Abe during his visit to Tokyo.

item.title: PayPal signs deal with OpenAI to embed payment system into ChatGPT
